roleset.name: to mix together

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Other ads do n't bother with the fundraising ; a touching , if self-congratulatory , American Telephone& Telegraph ad that [] aired Sunday intermixed footage of the devastation in San Francisco and Charleston , S.C. , with interviews of people recounting how AT & T helped [*T*] .
example.arg: touching , if self-congratulatory , American Telephone& Telegraph ad that [] aired Sunday
footage of the devastation in San Francisco and Charleston , S.C. ,
with interviews of people recounting how AT & T helped [*T*]

roleset.note: INTERMIX-V NOTES: Frames file for 'intermix' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from intermix.01-v predicate notes)
INTERMIXED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on medi-tmprl1to8. (from intermixed.01-j)
